

h1. eXo CS 1.1 Beta4 Release Notes






h2. Notable changes
* Import events to existing calendar
* Add attachments, description on invitation by email
* Check emails in reverse time order
* Customize the import event
* Export event with attachment file
* New upgrade [plug-in|CS:Data migration plugin]

h2. API Changes

CS does not maintain a public API.


h2. Dependencies Changes

CS 1.1 Beta4 relies on portal 2.2.

h2. How to upgrade

We will provide a complete upgrade guide from 1.0 for 1.1 final release.

h2. System Requirements
* Web Browser: IE6, IE7, FF2, FF3 (recommanded), Safari.
* JVM: version 1.5.0_xx only
* Application Server : Tomcat, JBoss
* Building Tools: Maven 2.0.6 and up
